name: bunnysitting
description:
take care of a virtual bunny! watch them grow up and leave the nest.

virtual bunnies don't need much care. read a book or browse the internet in a different window - just check in on your bunny every once in a while to see how they're doing and talk to them if they call out. (real bunnies need a lot of care though so please read up on them before considering buying one as a pet.)

best enjoyed with sound on while doing something else like drinking tea or having a biscuit.

other things i've worked on can be found here! you can comment right here or on twitter/tumblr with your thoughts. if you like my work and want to support me, you can buy me a coffee!
